entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:40 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
